kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
@fcalvo
Hm, this seems like a bug or regression. I'd [send this to support](https://community.kentico.com/support).
But, since you mention it works if you are on a different domain for the administration than the one you are linking to...
I recommend [running the Xperience administration over a different domain as your website channels](https://community.kentico.com/q-and-a/q/can-i-have-different-section-properties-based-on-the-channel-name-8e152458#answer_632354abca4b4fd2bd7f91379ca98e8a), even locally (you can use different `localhost` ports).
That said, I don't think that should cause the issue you are seeing.
